dialogue.name: OLDPERSON03759
dialogue.text: Ah! Nothin' like starin' out at the sea to bring an old man back to his glory days. Aye, the good ol' times when his whole life still lay ahead of him, and the greatest adventures were yet to be...

dialogue.name: OLDPERSON03759
dialogue.text: ...Gah! Don't ye know better than to sneak up on your elders like that, young'un? Are ye tryin' to send me to an early grave? Well, not early, as such...

dialogue.name: OLDPERSON03759
dialogue.text: But don't tell me...aye, I can see it just from the look o' you. You're an adventurer, an' an accomplished one at that, yes? Aye, ye may not be the greybeard I am, but I reckon you've a memory or two you'd be keen on rememberin'.

dialogue.name: OLDPERSON03759
dialogue.text: So what say ye join me for a while before ye return to the road? After all, sometimes reflectin' on the past can be just what you need to discover the path ye'd forge into the future.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to the New Game+ system. New Game+ allows you to relive the adventures of your past by replaying previous quests with your current character data.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To replay old quests with New Game+, open the New Game+ interface located under Duty in the main menu, and select the chapter you wish to experience anew.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that special rules and conditions will apply when replaying quests with New Game+. For detailed information, please review the help text in the New Game+ menu.
